I think so. It seems to me that if we're checking if the socket is open is because we are going to interact with it and we don't want the socket to be destroyed in the middle of the operation.

Having said that, I'd like to minimize the number of changes in this class. We could easily start creating deadlocks everywhere. Are you looking at any particular part of the code?
